TEXT.English: Make Ayutthaya the most populous city in the world in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1700年时使Ayutthaya成为世界上人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Population in cities on the Lower Nile: %d1 / %d2
Have a capital with developing culture by 900 AD, a different capital with refined culture by 1100 AD and another capital with influential culture by 1400 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元900年首都文化为正在发展，公元1100年首都文化为精致优雅，公元1400年首都文化为影响深远

TEXT.English: Secure or get by trade 7 spices resources by 1775 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1775年之前占据或通过贸易获得7处香料资源

TEXT.English: Strongest army of any nation with holdings in Africa: %s1
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有非洲领土的国家中最强大的军队: %s1

TEXT.English: Control 2 holy city shrines in 350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年（498回合）时控制2座宗教圣殿

TEXT.English: Found a city in America by 1100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1100年之前于美洲建立一座城市

TEXT.English: Pleased or friendly relations with independent European civilisations: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 与独立的欧洲文明建立愉快或友好的关系%d1/%d2

TEXT.English: Build three Islamic Grand Mosques by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1500年建造三座伊斯兰大清真寺
三桅战舰和主力战舰数： %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Allow no European colonies in North and Central America and in the Caribbean and control or vassalize Mexico in 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保在公元1900年时的北美洲、中美洲和加勒比地区没有欧洲人的殖民地；控制墨西哥地区，或纳为附庸

TEXT.English: Have the highest total culture and research output in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有公元1500年最高的文化和研究产出

TEXT.English: Have more than 15000 Culture in 170 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元170年（462回合）时至少拥有15000点文化值

TEXT.English: Make Cairo the most populous city in the world and have at least 30 population on the Lower Nile in 1380 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 使开罗成为世界上人口最多的城市，公元1380年，尼罗河下游至少有30人

TEXT.English: Have three Catholic vassals in Europe by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1650年在欧洲有三个天主教附庸

TEXT.English: Ensure there are no European colonies in Subequatorial Africa in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元1700年在非洲赤道下地区没有欧洲殖民地
在公元350年（253回合）之前控制7座世界级奇观

TEXT.English: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 50 turns by 1970 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1970年拥有世界上最高的支持率50回合

TEXT.English: Control three cities in the Maghreb and conquer two cities in Iberia and West Africa in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年控制马格里布的三个城市并征服伊比利亚和西非的两个城市

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前300年（121回合）之前在Carthage建成宫殿及巨港

TEXT.English: Control 2 holy city shrines in 350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年（253回合）时控制2座宗教圣殿

TEXT.English: Gift 10 Digger, Marines or Mechanized Infantry to at least three different civilizations by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1950年，赠送10个澳新军团、海军陆战队或机械化步兵给至少三个不同的文明
控制一个欧洲文明的核心区域

TEXT.English: Settle a total of ten great artists and statesmen in Vienna and have at least pleased relations with eight independent European civilisations by 1850 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1850年，在维也纳定居了十位伟大的艺术家和政治家，并与八个独立的欧洲文明建立了至少满意的关系
在公元1400年之前使佛教传播到全世界30%的城市

TEXT.English: Convert to Orthodoxy eight turns after its foundation and have three settled Great Prophets and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在东正教建立8个回合后皈依东正教，在公元1200年时有三位大先知和一个东正教大教堂。

TEXT.English: Control or get by trade 7 fur resources by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年前控制或通过贸易获得7种毛皮资源

TEXT.English: First to enter the Industrial Era
Colonies in Brazil, Africa and Asia: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 巴西、非洲和亚洲的殖民地: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Connect your capital to an Atlantic and a Pacific port by railroad by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1920年，通过铁路把首都连接到大西洋和太平洋港口

TEXT.English: Road along the Andean Coast in your territory
Make Constantinople the world's largest and most cultured city in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1200年时使君士坦丁堡成为世界上人口规模最大、文化程度最高的城市

TEXT.English: Build the Pyramids, the Great Library, and the Great Lighthouse by 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（408回合）之前完成建造大金字塔，大图书馆和大灯塔

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前300年（188回合）之前在Carthage建成宫殿及巨港

TEXT.English: Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前250年（193回合）之前完成建造奥林匹亚宙斯像、帕特农神庙、青铜巨像和阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: No European colonies in South America (except Brazil)
TEXT.Chinese: 南美洲（巴西除外）没有欧洲人的定居点

TEXT.English: Convert to Orthodoxy fifteen turns after its foundation and have three settled Great Prophets and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在东正教建立15个回合后皈依东正教，在公元1200年时有三位大先知和一个东正教大教堂。

TEXT.English: Control all of Indochina in 1580 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1580年控制了整个印度支那

TEXT.English: Chosen People: Have a total of 15 Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in your cities
TEXT.Chinese: Chosen People: Have a total of 15 Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in your cities

TEXT.English: Control three cities in the Balkans, Northern Africa and the Near East in 1450 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1450年时控制巴尔干地区、北非以及近东地区的三座城市

TEXT.English: Control 20% of the world's population in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1200年时人口数量排名第控制世界上20%的人口

TEXT.English: Experience six golden ages by 2000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元2000年时经历6次黄金时代

TEXT.English: Acquire 4500 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前通过劫掠、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得4500金币
世俗文明中的伟大科学家：%d1/%d2

TEXT.English: Ensure there are more Orthodox than Muslim cities in Africa in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保在公元1500年非洲东正教有比穆斯林更多的城市

TEXT.English: Conduct a trade mission to your holy city by 1350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1350年之前进行一次朝圣贸易

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前300年（368回合）之前在Carthage建成宫殿及巨港

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover Architecture, Politics, Scholarship, Machinery and Civil Service
TEXT.Chinese: 率先发现建筑、政治、学术、机械和公务员制度

TEXT.English: Make contact with a European civilization before any European civilization discovers America
TEXT.Chinese: 在任何欧洲文明发现美洲之前与欧洲文明接触

TEXT.English: Have 7500 gold in 1500 AD and 15000 gold in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年时积累5000金币，在公元1700年时积累15000金币

TEXT.English: Have more than 50000 culture in 1750 AD

TEXT.Chinese: 公元1301年控制了欧洲20%的领土

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 100 turns

TEXT.English: Controlled unimproved Forest and Marsh tiles: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 控制的未改良森林和沼泽地砖%d1/%d2

TEXT.English: Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前250年（124回合）之前完成建造奥林匹亚宙斯像、帕特农神庙、青铜巨像和阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: Have an average city culture of 18000 by 1600 AD without ever losing a city
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1600年，平均城市文化达到18000年，而且从未失去过一座城市

TEXT.English: First to discover technologies in the %s1 era: %d2 / %d3
TEXT.Chinese: 第一个发现%s1时代的技术的人：%d2/%d3

TEXT.English: Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前250年（378回合）之前完成建造奥林匹亚宙斯像、帕特农神庙、青铜巨像和阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: Acquire 15% of the votes in the Apostolic Palace by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1650年在教皇宫获得15%的选票

TEXT.English: Diaspora: Have friendly relations with six civilizations with a Jewish minority
TEXT.Chinese: Diaspora: Have friendly relations with six civilizations with a Jewish minority

TEXT.English: Hajj: Settle seven great people in the Muslim holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Hajj: Settle seven great people in the Muslim holy city

TEXT.English: Make your capital the city with the highest trade income in the world
TEXT.Chinese: Make your capital the city with the highest trade income in the world

TEXT.English: Acquire 12 trading company resources by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1650年之前获得12个贸易资源

TEXT.English: Build Notre Dame, Versailles, the Louvre, the Eiffel Tower and the Metropolitain by 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1900年建造圣母院、凡尔赛宫、卢浮宫、埃菲尔铁塔和大都会地铁

TEXT.English: Have a city of at least 20000 culture in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1800年时拥有一座超过20000点文化值的城市
在公元350年之前控制7座世界级奇观

TEXT.English: Have more than 7500 Culture in 170 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元170年（235回合）时至少拥有7500点文化值

TEXT.English: Secure a total of 10 silver and gold resources by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1650年之前控制10个白银和黄金资源

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize all cities and 90% of the territory in Canada without ever conquering a city by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 控制加拿大所有城市和90%的领土，在公元1950年以前从未征服过一座城市

TEXT.English: Build the Pyramids, the Great Library, and the Great Lighthouse by 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（208回合）之前完成建造大金字塔，大图书馆和大灯塔

TEXT.English: Conduct one Diplomatic Mission with the owner of an Egyptian city and 3 Trade Missions in your state religion's Holy City by 1259
TEXT.Chinese: 到1259年，与埃及一座城市的所有者进行一次外交使团，并在你国宗教的圣城举行3次贸易使团

TEXT.English: Have the largest army of Africa in 1600 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有公元1600年非洲最大的军队

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前850年（133回合）时使巴比伦成为人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Number of melee and gunpowder units: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 近战和火药单位的数量：%d1/%d2

TEXT.English: Acquire 9000 gold through piracy by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前通过海盗获得9000黄金

TEXT.English: Build 6 Castras, 5 Aqueducts, 4 Arenas and 3 Forums by 100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元100年(228回合)之前建造6座兵营、5座引水渠、4座竞技场和3座中心花园

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, Phoenicia, Babylonia and Persia in 330 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前330年（362回合）时控制埃及、腓尼基、巴比伦和波斯

TEXT.English: Control the largest army of any nation with holdings in Africa and control Libya, Nigeria, and Cameroon by 1603
TEXT.Chinese: 在非洲控制着所有国家中最大的军队，并在1603年控制利比亚、尼日利亚和喀麦隆

TEXT.English: Never lose a single city until 1950 AD and Allow no foreign powers in Southern Asia in 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前不失去任何一座城市，公元1950年不允许外国势力进入南亚。

TEXT.English: Build 6 step pyramids and sacrificial altars by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1650年之前建成6所原始神庙和人牲祭坛

TEXT.English: Have 100 turns of cities celebrating "We Love the King" day
TEXT.Chinese: Have 100 turns of cities celebrating "We Love the King" day

TEXT.English: Build San Marco Basilica, the Sistine Chapel and Santa Maria del Fiore by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前建造圣马可大教堂、西斯廷教堂和圣玛丽亚教堂

TEXT.English: Build four Buddhist Sanghas and Hindu Ashrams and Wat Preah Pisnulok and control them in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1200年建造四座佛教僧伽和印度教道场，并控制它们

TEXT.English: Have a city of at least 60000 culture in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1800年时拥有一座超过60000点文化值的城市

TEXT.English: Continuous empire from the Danube River to Lake Zaysan
TEXT.Chinese: 从多瑙河到扎桑湖的连续帝国

TEXT.English: Build three Christian Cathedrals by 1600 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1600年之前建造三座天主教大教堂

TEXT.English: Control the core of another European civilization in 1050 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1050年时控制其他欧洲文明的核心区域

TEXT.English: You have failed goal %d1 of your historical victory!
Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元320年（162回合）时控制在真实历史中属于罗马帝国的所有领土

TEXT.English: Control 9% of the world's population in 1940 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1940年控制了世界人口的9%
与工匠一起生产200种文化

TEXT.English: Have a total population of 30 by 800 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前800年总人口达到30人

TEXT.English: Control 12% of the world by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前控制世界12%的土地

TEXT.English: Have the highest food, production and commerce output in 1850 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1850年拥有最高的粮食、生产和商业产出
在公元1450年之前拥有12000点文化值

TEXT.English: Acquire 4500 gold by selling resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1950年之前通过交易资源获得4500金币

TEXT.English: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 300 turns

TEXT.English: Acquire 4500 gold through piracy by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前通过海盗获取4500黄金

TEXT.English: Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（134回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚

TEXT.English: Turns of "We Love the King" days: %d1 / %d2
Sila: Be at peace for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Sila: Be at peace for 300 turns

TEXT.English: Be the first to adopt Tolerance and have Friendly Relations with 5 Catholic Civs in 1867 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1867年，率先采取宽容态度，与5个天主教公民建立友好关系

TEXT.English: Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元320年时控制在真实历史中属于西罗马帝国的所有领土

TEXT.English: Spread Catholicism to 30% of the world population and allow no Protestant civilizations in Europe in 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年，天主教传播到世界人口的30%，欧洲不允许新教文明

TEXT.English: Be the first civilization to complete the Manhattan Project and a Lunar Landing
TEXT.Chinese: 成为第一个完成曼哈顿计划和登月的文明

TEXT.English: Ritual: Have five wonders in the Confucian holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Ritual: Have five wonders in the Confucian holy city

TEXT.English: Conduct a Diplomatic mission in a European City controlled by a Muslim Civilization by 1031 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1031年前在一个由穆斯林文明控制的欧洲城市执行外交任务

TEXT.English: City in China connected to a Mediterranean port
TEXT.Chinese: 中国与地中海港口相连的城市
在公元350年（164回合）之前控制7座世界级奇观

TEXT.English: Have 4500 gold and 3000 culture in 800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元800年时拥有4500金币并积累3000点文化值

TEXT.English: Religious Freedom: Make sure at least half of all civilizations are Protestant or secular
TEXT.Chinese: Religious Freedom: Make sure at least half of all civilizations are Protestant or secular

TEXT.English: Have more than 750 culture in 550 AD
Acquire 9000 gold by selling resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1950年之前通过交易资源获得9000金币

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world in 700 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前700年时（148回合）使巴比伦成为世界上文化程度最高的城市

TEXT.English: Be the first to complete all Industrial technologies and eight Global technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 率先完成所有工业技术和八项全球技术

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前850年时使巴比伦成为世界上人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Have three cities with influential culture by 1600 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1600年之前拥有3座文化级别为影响深远的城市

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world by 700 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前700年之前使巴比伦成为世界上文化最发达的城市

TEXT.English: Allow no European Colonies in Southern Africa by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1920年，不允许在南部非洲建立欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Acquire 6000 gold by selling resources by 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年通过出售资源获得6000黄金

TEXT.English: Allow no foreign powers in Southern Asia in 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1900年时确保南亚没有非南亚文明的殖民地

TEXT.English: Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元320年（250回合）时控制在真实历史中属于罗马帝国的所有领土

TEXT.English: No European colonies in South Africa
Control the shrines of Hinduism and Buddhism in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（208回合）时控制印度教和佛教的圣殿

TEXT.English: Secure or get by trade 5 gems resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1950年，通过交易获得5种宝石资源

TEXT.English: Have more than 500 culture in 550 AD
Have 10 Religious Happiness and a larger Jewish population than any other nation in 1031 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1031年，拥有10个宗教上的幸福和比任何其他国家都多的犹太人口

TEXT.English: Railroad from Cape Town to an Egyptian Mediterranean port
TEXT.Chinese: 开普敦到埃及地中海港口的铁路

TEXT.English: Make Mexico City the largest city in the world in 1960 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1960时确保墨西哥城是全世界人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Acquire 4000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions) by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1200年之前通过贸易(商路、外交手段、贸易访问)获得4000金币

TEXT.English: Don't allow more than half of your cities to have a religion
TEXT.Chinese: Don't allow more than half of your cities to have a religion

TEXT.English: Have more than 5000 Culture in 170 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元170年（152回合）时候拥有超过5000文化点

TEXT.English: Create three great generals by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年创造三位大将军

TEXT.English: South America, Central America and the Caribbean: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 南美洲、中美洲以及加勒比地区： %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Allow no foreign cities in South America in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年不允许外国城市进入南美

TEXT.English: Great artists and statesmen settled in %s1: %d2 / %d3
TEXT.Chinese: 伟大的艺术家和政治家定居在%s1%d2/%d3

TEXT.English: Control Northern Africa, Hejaz, the Levant and Mesopotamia by 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1300年控制北非、赫贾兹、黎凡特和美索不达米亚

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, Phoenicia, Babylonia and Persia in 330 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前330年（185回合）时控制埃及、腓尼基、巴比伦和波斯

TEXT.English: No European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年在东非近赤道地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: Build 3 Confucian Guozijians and 3 Taoist Gongs and 2 Buddhist Chaityas by 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1000年之前造有2座学宫和2座道宫

TEXT.English: Create an overland trade route from any city in China to one of your Mediterranean ports and spread the Silk Route to 10 of your cities by 1100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 创建一条从中国任何城市到地中海港口的陆路贸易路线，并在公元1100年前将丝绸之路延伸到10个城市

TEXT.English: Acquire 4000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions, dhows) by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1500年，通过贸易（贸易路线、外交、贸易使团、独桅帆船）获得4000黄金

TEXT.English: Experience a golden age by 550 AD
Holy Land: Control the Catholic shrine and make sure that at least 12 great prophets are settled in Catholic civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Holy Land: Control the Catholic shrine and make sure that at least 12 great prophets are settled in Catholic civilizations

TEXT.English: Build five Tambos and a road along the Andean Coast by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前建造5所土堡驿站，并修建一条安第斯大道（沿着安第斯海岸）

TEXT.English: No European colonies in North and Central America and the Caribbean
TEXT.Chinese: 北美洲、中美洲和加勒比地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: Be first to create three different types of great person
TEXT.Chinese: Be first to create three different types of great person

TEXT.English: Never more than half of all cities with a religion
TEXT.Chinese: 有宗教信仰的城市不超过一半

TEXT.English: Acquire 10 different happiness resources by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前获得10种不同的快乐资源

TEXT.Chinese: 公元900年建造库库尔坎神庙

TEXT.English: No foreign cities in South America
Control the Eastern Mediterranean, the Black Sea, Cairo, Mecca, Baghdad and Vienna by 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年控制东地中海、黑海、开罗、麦加、巴格达和维也纳

TEXT.Chinese: Harmony: Have friendly relations with five civilizations

TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1500年，通过贸易（贸易路线、外交、贸易使团、独桅帆船）获得6000黄金

TEXT.English: Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前250年（378回合）之前完成建造奥林匹亚宙斯像、帕特农神庙、青铜巨像和阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: Have 9000 gold and 6000 culture in 800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元800年时拥有9000金币并积累6000点文化值

TEXT.English: Have 20% of the world population in 1850 AD

TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1980年建造洲际弹道导弹

TEXT.English: Build the Statue of Liberty, the Brooklyn Bridge, the Empire State Building, the Golden Gate Bridge, the Pentagon and the United Nations by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1950年之前建成自由女神像、帝国大厦、五角大楼以及联合国

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前850年（84回合）时使巴比伦成为人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Artha: Experience 24 turns of golden age
TEXT.Chinese: Artha: Experience 24 turns of golden age

TEXT.English: Establish a trade connection with another civilization by 1600 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前1600年与其他文明建立贸易联系

TEXT.English: Build Wembley, Cristo Redentor and the Itaipu Dam
TEXT.Chinese: 建造温布利球场、救世基督像和1座世界级大水坝

TEXT.English: Sila: Be at peace for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Sila: Be at peace for 100 turns

TEXT.English: Have 3000 gold and 2000 culture in 800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元800年时拥有3000金币并积累2000点文化值

TEXT.English: Colonize every continent by 1860 AD and build the Cape to Cairo Railway by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 率先进入工业时代和信息时代

TEXT.English: Build an Islamic Grand Mosque by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前修建一座伊斯兰大清真寺

TEXT.English: Gain 1000 gold through slave trade by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1800年通过奴隶贸易获得1000金币

TEXT.English: Modernity: Make sure that the five most advanced independent civilizations are secular
TEXT.Chinese: Modernity: Make sure that the five most advanced independent civilizations are secular

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover eight Global and eight Digital technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 率先发现8项全球和8项数字技术

TEXT.English: Conduct two trade or diplomatic missions with the most prominent (top scoring) European civilization by 1327 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1327年，主导在欧洲文明最突出（得分最高）的两个贸易或外交使团

TEXT.English: Acquire 12000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions) by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1200年之前通过贸易(商路、外交手段、贸易访问)获得12000金币

TEXT.English: Found 7 colonies in Siberia by 1700 AD and build the Trans-Siberian Railway by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年在西伯利亚建立了7个殖民地，1920年修建了横贯西伯利亚的铁路

TEXT.English: Settle Hawaii, New Zealand, Marquesas and Easter Island by 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年前定居夏威夷、新西兰、马奎萨和复活节岛
在公元600年之前发现历法

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world in 700 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元700前年时（94回合）使巴比伦成为世界上文化程度最高的城市

TEXT.English: Pleased or friendly relations with Christian civilisations: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 与基督教文明保持愉快或友好的关系: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize the Deccan and Srivijaya in 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年对德干和斯里维贾亚的控制或封育

TEXT.English: Build the Pyramids, the Great Library, and the Great Lighthouse by 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年(134回合)之前完成建造大金字塔，大图书馆和大灯塔

TEXT.English: Acquire 8 different happiness resources by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年获得8种不同的幸福资源

TEXT.English: Gain 3000 gold through slave trade by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1800年通过奴隶贸易获得3000金币
天主教文明控制的领土：1/%2%

TEXT.English: Spread Islam to 30% of the cities in the world
TEXT.Chinese: 使伊斯兰教传播到全世界30%的城市

TEXT.English: Communion: Make sure there are no Catholic civilizations in the world
TEXT.Chinese: Communion: Make sure there are no Catholic civilizations in the world

TEXT.English: Holy See: Be Pope for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Holy See: Be Pope for 100 turns
有伟大先知的东正教城市：%d1/%d2

TEXT.English: Be first to discover Compass, Paper, Gunpowder and Printing
TEXT.Chinese: 率先发现罗盘、造纸、火药、印刷机

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, Phoenicia, Babylonia and Persia in 330 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前330年（119回合）时控制埃及、腓尼基、巴比伦和波斯

TEXT.English: Have open borders agreement with 14 other civs by 1550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500之前与14个国家开放边界

TEXT.English: Enlightenment: Be first to discover Civil Liberties, Social Contract and Economics
TEXT.Chinese: Enlightenment: Be first to discover Civil Liberties, Social Contract and Economics

TEXT.English: Control a Hit Movie and spread Oil Industry to a city by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 控制一部热门电影并在公元1950年前将石油工业传播到一个城市

TEXT.English: Kama: Make sure the five largest cities in the world are Hindu
TEXT.Chinese: Kama: Make sure the five largest cities in the world are Hindu

TEXT.English: Acquire four pearl resources and control 50 ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: Acquire four pearl resources and control 50 ocean tiles

TEXT.English: No European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa in 1910 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1910年在东非近赤道地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: As a communist civilisation, have friendly relations with five other communist civilisations by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 作为一个共产主义文明，到公元1950年与其他五个共产主义文明建立友好关系
永远不要失去一座城市

TEXT.English: Have more than 500 Culture in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前850年(84回合)时拥有超过500文化点

TEXT.English: Have 7 great people in Berlin in 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1900年时在柏林入驻7位历史伟人

TEXT.English: Holy Mission: Make sure at least 50% of the world is controlled by Catholic civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Holy Mission: Make sure at least 50% of the world is controlled by Catholic civilizations

TEXT.English: Build the Moai Statues by 1200 AD
Build the St. Sophia Cathedral and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1327 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在AD1327年前建造圣索菲亚大教堂以及东正教大教堂

TEXT.English: Control 6% of the world and pillage 20 improvements by 900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元900年控制6%的世界，掠夺20个改进
在公元1450年之前拥有8000点文化值

TEXT.English: Control 20 Forest Preserves and have a National Park in your capital by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1950年时控制20座森林保护区，并且在首都拥有一所国家公园
欧洲不存在信仰新教的国家

TEXT.English: Control the city with the highest research for 10 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 控制研究最高的城市10回合

TEXT.English: Have open borders with 6 European civilizations in 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年与6个欧洲文明有着开放的边界
在公元200年（238回合）时积累7500金币

TEXT.English: Have four non-obsolete wonders in your capital in 1550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1550年在你的首都有四个不过时的奇迹

TEXT.English: Middle Way: Have cautious or better relations with all civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Middle Way: Have cautious or better relations with all civilizations

TEXT.English: Settle two of the following island groups by 800 AD: Hawaii, New Zealand, Marquesas and Easter Island
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元800年前定居下列2个岛群：夏威夷、新西兰、马奎萨岛和复活节岛
通往太平洋港口的铁路

TEXT.English: Control 2 Orthodox Cathedrals and have Pleased or better relations with 5 other Christian Civilizations in 1365
TEXT.Chinese: 在1365年控制了2个东正教大教堂，并与其他5个基督教文明有着愉快或更好的关系

TEXT.English: Experience five golden ages by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1800年之前开创4个黄金时代

TEXT.English: Work Ethic: Make sure five great merchants and five great engineers are settled in Protestant civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Work Ethic: Make sure five great merchants and five great engineers are settled in Protestant civilizations

TEXT.English: Shahnameh: Have legendary culture in the Zoroastrian holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Shahnameh: Have legendary culture in the Zoroastrian holy city

TEXT.English: Control 7% of the world by 140 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元140年控制世界7%的土地

TEXT.English: Control the Baltic Coast, the Kattegat and the Skagerak by 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年前控制波罗的海沿岸、卡特加特河和斯卡格拉克河
在公元1745年之前攻克4座欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 300 turns

TEXT.English: Have more gold in your treasury than the rest of the world combined
TEXT.Chinese: Have more gold in your treasury than the rest of the world combined
在公元1920年时控制南美洲
世界上人口最多的文明：

TEXT.English: Control ten wonders that require no state religion
TEXT.Chinese: Control ten wonders that require no state religion

TEXT.English: Have 11250 gold in 1500 AD and 22500 gold in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年时积累7500金币，在公元1700年时积累22500金币

TEXT.English: Acquire 12000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions, dhows) by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1500年，通过贸易（贸易路线、外交、贸易使团、独桅帆船）获得12000黄金

TEXT.English: Have legendary culture in Paris in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1700年时使巴黎拥有传奇文化（25000点文化值）

TEXT.English: Experience two golden ages by 1930 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1930年时经历2次黄金时代

TEXT.English: Settle three great spies in your capital
TEXT.Chinese: Settle three great spies in your capital

TEXT.English: Be the first to found a colony in America
Civilization with the largest Catholic population:
TEXT.Chinese: 全世界天主教人口最多的文明：

TEXT.English: Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元320年（492回合）时控制在真实历史中属于罗马帝国的所有领土

TEXT.English: Have five Great Priests, Great Scientists, or Great Artists and one of each settled in your cities in 1211 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 有五位大先知，伟大的科学家，或伟大的艺术家，每一位都在公元1211年前定居在你的城市里

TEXT.English: Acquire 6000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions) by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1200年之前通过贸易(商路、外交手段、贸易访问)获得6000金币

TEXT.English: Enter the Industrial Era before anyone enters the Global Era
TEXT.Chinese: 在任何人进入全球时代之前进入工业时代

TEXT.English: Be first to discover Civil Liberties
Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（208回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚
在公元600年（549回合）之前发现历法

TEXT.English: Have open borders with 10 civilizations by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1650年与10个文明有开放的边界

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover Mathematics, Literature, Aesthetics, Philosophy and Medicine
TEXT.Chinese: 率先获得数学、文献、美学、哲学和传统医学

TEXT.English: Have more culture than all European civilizations combined in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 文化比公元1800年欧洲所有文明的总和还要多

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前300年（369回合）之前在Carthage建成宫殿及巨港

TEXT.English: Acquire 9000 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前通过劫掠、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得9000金币

TEXT.English: We have accomplished our second Historical Goal. A Golden Age has begun for our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们完成了3个历史目标中的2个。一座凯旋门已在我们首都建成。

TEXT.English: Acquire 3000 gold by selling resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1950年之前通过交易资源获得3000金币

TEXT.English: Create three great generals by 1940 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1940年之前产生3位大军事家

TEXT.English: Have more than 750 Culture in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前850年（133回合）时至少拥有750点文化值

TEXT.English: Convert to Orthodoxy five turns after its foundation and have three settled Great Prophets and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在东正教建立5个回合后皈依东正教，在公元1200年时有三位大先知和一个东正教大教堂。
世俗文明中的伟大政治家：%d1/%d2

TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前700年时288回合）使巴比伦成为世界上文化程度最高的城市

TEXT.Chinese: Artha: Experience 36 turns of golden age

TEXT.Chinese: 拥有全球最高支持率达25回合

Continuous empire from the Barents Sea to the Mediterranean Sea
TEXT.Chinese: 从巴伦支海到地中海的连续帝国

斯卡格拉克和凯特加特

TEXT.Chinese: 拥有最多犹太人的文明: %s1

TEXT.Chinese: 在1200年之前建成一座佛寺和一座学宫

TEXT.English: Make Tenochtitlan the largest city in the world in 1520 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1520年时确保Tenochtitlan是全世界人口最多的城市

Be the first to discover ten Industrial technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1800年时控制25艘三桅战舰和主力战舰并且击沉50艘敌舰

TEXT.English: Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（134回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚

TEXT.English: Have an average city culture of 9000 by 1600 AD without ever losing a city
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1600年，平均有9000个城市文化，而且从未失去过一个城市

TEXT.English: Control a continuous empire from a port on the Barents Sea to a port on the Mediterranean Sea
TEXT.Chinese: 从巴伦支海的一个港口到地中海的一个港口，控制着一个连续的帝国
在公元1000年之前拥有5座城市

TEXT.Chinese: 在公元200年之前建造6座兵营、5座引水渠4座竞技场以及3座中心花园

TEXT.English: Build La Mezquita and settle a total of four great prophets, scientists or engineers in Cordoba by 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1300年，在科尔多瓦建造拉梅兹基塔并安置四位伟大的先知、科学家或工程师

TEXT.Chinese: 征服4个向你宣战的城市

TEXT.English: Build the University of Sankore and settle a great prophet in its city by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年前建立桑科尔大学并在其城市安置一位伟大的先知

TEXT.Chinese: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 150 turns

TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年在澳大利亚建立了一座城市

TEXT.Chinese: Make sure there are 15 pagan temples in the world

TEXT.Chinese: Humility: Have legendary culture in the Taoist holy city

TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年（164回合）时控制2座宗教圣殿

TEXT.Chinese: 在公元100年(147回合)之前建造6座兵营、5座引水渠、4座竞技场和3座中心花园

TEXT.Chinese: 不要让任何波斯或突厥民族在奥斯曼帝国崩溃之前征服阿拉伯半岛的一座城市

TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前通过劫掠区域设施、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得3000金币

TEXT.English: Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（408回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚
每座城市商业产值最高: %s1

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, the Maghreb, Spain, Mesopotamia and Persia directly or by vassal in 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1300年时征服埃及、马格里布、西班牙、美索不达米亚和波斯，或纳为附庸

TEXT.English: Build 6 Castras, 5 Aqueducts, 4 Arenas and 3 Forums by 100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元100年(448回合)之前建造6座兵营、5座引水渠、4座竞技场和3座中心花园

TEXT.English: Currently no European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa
TEXT.Chinese: 确保东非及其近赤道地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: Control Australia, New Zealand, New Guinea and 3 Pacific island in 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年控制澳大利亚、新西兰、新几内亚和3个太平洋岛屿
在公元200年（468回合）时积累7500金币时积累15000金币

TEXT.English: Control a continuous empire from the Danube River to Lake Zaysan in 1241 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1241年控制了一个从多瑙河到扎伊桑湖的连续帝国

TEXT.English: Check the Victory Conditions (F8) for details
TEXT.Chinese: 查看胜利条件界面(F8)了解详情
与%s1少数民族的友好文明%d2/%d3

TEXT.English: Control 2 holy city shrines in 350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年时控制2座圣城神殿

TEXT.English: Control the shrines of Hinduism and Buddhism in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（408回合）时控制印度教和佛教的圣殿

TEXT.English: Build three cathedrals of your state religion by 1880 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1880年之前建造完成3所官方宗教的大教堂

TEXT.English: No foreign colonies in South Asia
TEXT.Chinese: 南亚没有外国的殖民地

TEXT.English: Control more culture producing buildings in your capital than any other nation in 1229
TEXT.Chinese: 1229年，在你的首都控制比任何其他国家都多的文化生产建筑

TEXT.English: Have an average city size of 12 or more in 1450 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1450年之前城市人口的平均值达到12以上

TEXT.English: Great prophets settled in the Sankore city: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 在桑科雷大学内入驻的大预言家: %d1 / %d2
在公元600年（181回合）之前发现历法

TEXT.English: Control 65% of the Mediterranean by 1930 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元1930年控制了地中海的65%

TEXT.English: Humanism: Make sure there are 25 Universities, 10 Great Scientists and 10 Great Statesmen in secular civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Humanism: Make sure there are 25 Universities, 10 Great Scientists and 10 Great Statesmen in secular civilizations

TEXT.English: Control 8% of the world by 140 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元140年控制世界8%的土地

TEXT.English: No European colonies in Central America, Southern USA and the Caribbean
TEXT.Chinese: 中美洲、美国南部和加勒比地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: Be the most advanced civilization in 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1300年时成为最先进的文明

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover eight Industrial and eight Global era technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 率先发现八项工业和八项全球时代的技术

TEXT.English: Control the shrines of Hinduism and Buddhism in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元前100年（134回合）时控制印度教和佛教的圣殿
把至少7个城市夷为平地

TEXT.English: End twelve wars through diplomacy by 2000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元2000年通过外交手段结束十二次战争

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize 40% of Europe and North America in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1800年时控制欧洲和北美洲40%的地域或纳为附庸

TEXT.English: Promised Land: Have legendary culture in the Jewish holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Promised Land: Have legendary culture in the Jewish holy city

TEXT.English: Sell 5 Slaves and buy 5 Strategic Resources by 1380
TEXT.Chinese: 到1380年，卖掉5个奴隶，购买5个战略资源

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize Korea, Manchuria, China, Indochina, Indonesia and Philippines in 1940 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1940年对朝鲜、中国东北、中国中原地区、东南亚地区、印度尼西亚和菲律宾的控制

TEXT.English: Loyalty: Control an army of 200 non-obsolete melee or gunpowder units
TEXT.Chinese: Loyalty: Control an army of 200 non-obsolete melee or gunpowder units

TEXT.English: Control Mesopotamia, Transoxania and Northwestern India in 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1750年时控制美索不达米亚、中亚河中地区（阿姆河流域）和印度西北部

TEXT.English: Acquire 4000 gold by selling resources by 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年通过出售资源获得4000黄金

TEXT.English: Build three Reservoirs, two Granaries and two Smokehouses by 1500 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 到公元前1500年建造三座水库，两座粮仓和两座烟馆
穆罕默德・伊本・图格卢克

TEXT.English: Sila: Be at peace for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Sila: Be at peace for 150 turns

TEXT.English: Have more than 75000 culture in 1750 AD
Build four castles and kraals and Great Zimbabwe and control them in 1400 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1400年，建造四座城堡和牧场，以及大津巴布韦，并控制它们

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover Construction, Arithmetics, Writing, Calendar and Contract
TEXT.Chinese: 率先发现建筑学、算术、文字、日历和契约精神

TEXT.English: Have more than 1500 culture in 550 AD
Acquire eight ivory resources and six gem resources
TEXT.Chinese: Acquire eight ivory resources and six gem resources

TEXT.English: Have 22500 gold in 1500 AD and 45000 gold in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年时积累15000金币，在公元1700年时积累45000金币
人均商业值最高的城市：%s1
在公元600年（278回合）之前发现历法

TEXT.English: Allow no European colonies in Peru, Gran Colombia, the Guayanas and the Caribbean in 1870 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1870年时确保秘鲁、大哥伦比亚、圭亚那和加勒比海地区没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Have the largest population in the world in 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1300年时拥有世界最多的人口
